description:
A configurable Windows status bar.

A configurable Windows status bar.
New Features
- Libre Hardware Monitor Widget 
- Update wallpapers widget configuration and add gallery options 
Bugfixes
- added default values for info dict 
- No connection message for histogram 
Refactors
- Update update command to run installation and restart application 
- Add is_windows_10() method 
- Update power menu blur settings for Windows 10 compatibility 
Other Changes
- Refactor CLI.md: Update 'update' command description 
- Merge pull request #59 by Video-Nomad from Video-Nomad/feat/libre-hardware-monitor-widget 
- Update build version to 1.3.2 
What's Changed
- feat(widget): Libre Hardware Monitor Widget by @Video-Nomad in #59
New Contributors
- @Video-Nomad made their first contribution in #59
Full Changelog: https://github.com/amnweb/yasb/compare/v1.3.1...v1.3.2
